actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that certain expenses incurred in the construction of a municipal building in Talladega, Ala., shall be eligible as local grants-in-aid for purposes of Title I of the Housing Act of 1949.

summary.text: Provides that expenses incurred in the construction of the J.L. Hardwick Municipal Building in Talladega, Alabama, shall be eligible as local grants-in-aid for purposes of title I of the Housing Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain expenses incurred in the construction of a municipal building in Talladega, Ala., shall be eligible as local grants-in-aid for purposes of Title I of the Housing Act of 1949.
